A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disclaimer: I was not feeling well when I saw the film. That stated\, there were many moments of disappointment. The story line\, subsequent script\, jokes\, character development (lack of) were not the film's priorities\, which left me thinking it was designed for a very different type of film fan than me. Great effects\, some breath holding moments\, a few plot surprises and the wonderful John Williams score were the highlights. Probably will play less successfully on your den's TV.
